meanings.definition: To change from a glassy to a crystalline structure.
meanings.sent1: The hot lava slowly devitrifying into solid rock.
meanings.sent2: The liquid cooled, devitrifying into a beautiful crystal.
meanings.sent3: The glass sculpture seemed to be devitrifying into a magical crystal castle.
meanings.sent4: Her icy demeanor began devitrifying, revealing her warm heart underneath.
meanings.sent5: The process of devitrifying turned the plain glass into a sparkling gem.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of crystallization.
meanings.sent1: The solution started devitrifying, forming tiny crystals.
meanings.sent2: The sugar slowly devitrifying into sweet crystals.
meanings.sent3: The potion in the cauldron was devitrifying into a shimmering elixir.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were devitrifying, crystallizing into a clear plan.
meanings.sent5: The magic spell had begun devitrifying, transforming into a solid enchantment.
